page.description: The FTP_GET_NLIST() function returns a list of files in a directory, i.e. retrieves a directory listing from a FTP server
page.prototype: File_List as C = ftp_get_nlist(C address ,C user ,C password [,C path ])

argument.name: File_List
argument.description: A list of files located in the specified directory.

argument.name: address
argument.description: The FTP address of the transmission.

argument.name: path
argument.description: The directory of the Address and the specification for the file types to retrieve.

page.example: dim fl as C fl = ftp_get_file("www.alphasoftware.com", "alpha5", "password", "learningcenter.asp") ? fl = A1BookingScreen.jpg A1ControlCentre.jpg A1Invoice.jpg Action_Script_ADO_ODBC_Data.jpg Action_Script_View_Xbasic.jpg ...
